content.en: Agricultural Optimization: Researchers have developed algorithms to solve various challenges in agricultural field operations. These algorithms optimize coverage path planning, generate optimal paths for agricultural machines, consider obstacle areas, minimize skips and overlaps, and optimize robot trajectories on rolling terrains. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to increase field efficiency, reduce adverse effects on soil, minimize energy consumption and emissions, and improve the overall performance of autonomous agricultural robots.
content.da: Landbrugsoptimering: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at løse forskellige udfordringer i landbrugsoperationer. Disse algoritmer optimerer dækning af planlægningsruter, genererer optimale stier for landbrugsmaskiner, tager højde for forhindringsområder, minimerer udeladelser og overlap og optimerer robot-trajectorier på kuperet terræn. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer, sigter forskerne mod at øge markeffektiviteten, reducere negative virkninger på jorden, minimere energiforbrug og emissioner samt forbedre den samlede ydeevne for autonome landbrugsrobotter.
